aspguidp.service.core

Class CoreServicePool

  • java.lang.Object
    • aspguidp.service.core.CoreServicePool

  • public class CoreServicePool
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton core service pool class.

    The core service pool provide methods to access services and managers of the application core, which are handling the management of the logic program atoms and the execution of the logic program solver.

    This class enables the initialisation of these services and managers in a single place. Other parts of the application can access the services and managers of the core of the application in a simple way through this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AnswerSetManager getAnswerSetManager()
      Method to access the answer set manager of the application, which manages the resulting answer sets of the execution of the logic program.
      AspSolverService getAspSolverService()
      Method to access the asp solver service of the application, which is responsible for execution the logic program.
      AtomHub getInputAtomHub()
      Method to access the input atom hub of the application, which manages the atoms which are passed to the logic program on logic program execution.
      static CoreServicePool getInstance() 
      AtomHub getOutputAtomHub()
      Method to access the output atom hub of the application, which manages the atoms of the currently displayed answer set.
      SolverMessageManager getSolverMessageManager()
      Method to access the solver message manager of the application, which manages messages of the logic program solver which is executed on the execution of the logic program.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static CoreServicePool getInstance()
        Returns:
        singleton service pool instance of this class

      • getInputAtomHub

        public AtomHub getInputAtomHub()
        Method to access the input atom hub of the application, which manages the atoms which are passed to the logic program on logic program execution. If the input atom hub is not initialized yet, it is initializes before it is returned.
        Returns:
        input atom hub instance of the application

      • getOutputAtomHub

        public AtomHub getOutputAtomHub()
        Method to access the output atom hub of the application, which manages the atoms of the currently displayed answer set. If the output hub is not initialized yet, it is initialized before it is returned.
        Returns:
        output atom hub instance of the application

      • getAnswerSetManager

        public AnswerSetManager getAnswerSetManager()
        Method to access the answer set manager of the application, which manages the resulting answer sets of the execution of the logic program. If the answer set manager is not initialized yet, it is initialized before it is returned.
        Returns:
        answer set manager instance of the application

      • getSolverMessageManager

        public SolverMessageManager getSolverMessageManager()
        Method to access the solver message manager of the application, which manages messages of the logic program solver which is executed on the execution of the logic program. If the solver message manager is not initialized yet, it is initialized before it is returned.
        Returns:
        solver message manager instance of the application

      • getAspSolverService

        public AspSolverService getAspSolverService()
        Method to access the asp solver service of the application, which is responsible for execution the logic program. If the asp solver service is not initialized yet, it is initialized before it is returned.
        Returns:
        asp solver service instance of the application
